title: Billing CRUD Controller
description:
Implement Claim Management Controller with Status Tracking and Amount Management

Build a comprehensive controller to handle claim lifecycle operations, including creation, status updates, and financial amount tracking.

Requirements:
- Create RESTful endpoints for CRUD operations on claims (create, read, update, delete)
- Implement status workflow management with defined state transitions (e.g., draft → submitted → under review → approved/rejected → paid)
- Add validation to prevent invalid status transitions
- Support amount/financial value tracking for each claim with proper decimal handling
- Include endpoints for updating claim amounts with authorization checks
- Implement filtering and querying capabilities (by status, date range, amount range, user)
- Add proper error handling and validation for all inputs
- Return appropriate HTTP status codes and error messages
- Include audit logging for status changes and amount modifications
- Support pagination for listing claims
- Add authentication and authorization middleware to protect endpoints

Edge Cases to Consider:
- Concurrent updates to the same claim
- Handling claims with zero or negative amounts
- Status transition rollback scenarios
- Partial amount updates vs full claim updates
- Claims in terminal states (completed/cancelled) being modified

Dependencies:
- Database schema/model for claims entity
- Authentication/authorization system
- Input validation framework
- Logging infrastructure
